Hey guys, i just wanted to show you my Curiosity like rover and my trip to Duna with it. I used the Novapunch and Cart mod for this so im sorry if you consider that cheating but i had no other way.

I dont know how to put an imgur album inside the thread so im leaving you guys the link:

http://imgur.com/a/KttPv#10

Im also uploading the craft so you can fly it yourselves and tell me what you think:

http://www./?bau2iug58t5wi9u

Thanks, remember to comment so i know what i need to do better next time

Edited October 18, 2012 by sal_vager

Very nice! I'll have to try later. Oh and by the way, the only cheating in KSP is editing your persistence file for auto-orbiting, and even that is not noob-friendly. Some would consider mechjeb cheating, but I don't think the people that say that had even tried using it(its more useful for the instrument panel numbers than as an auto-pilot) Most mods are pretty well-balanced and anyone who doesn't at least use the carts mod is just stroking his e-peen. Ok, off my soapbox. Seriously, your craft is pretty good. Well done, sir!

Also, good rover, I like it and will be trying it out later. No mods are cheating in my opinion, its your playing style, if you like "cheating" then do it and don't be put off by other people.

Thanks.
